snippet: Primavera Sound in Barcelona is an expansive music showcase that has gradually become one of the top tickets of the European festival season and a template for other promoters worldwide.
abstract: Primavera Sound, expansive musical showcase in Barcelona, Spain, has become one of top festivals of European season and template for promoters worldwide; festival's 14th edition features more than 300 acts encompassing wide range of music genres.
lead_paragraph: Primavera Sound in Barcelona is an expansive music showcase that has gradually become one of the top tickets of the European festival season and a template for other promoters worldwide.

headline.seo: Primavera Sound Sets the Stage for Music Festivals Worldwide
headline.main: Showcasing Music Till the Sun Comes Up
headline.print_headline: Showcasing Music Till the Sun Comes Up
